author: ivan
msg: Return specific serf error codes when HTTP response contains very long
(serf_error_string): Provide error messages for new status codes.

author: lgo
msg: Merge the last batch of changes for 1.3.1:
r2123,2126: Fix issue #111: fix hardcoded library path
r2125: Fix issue #121: scons CFLAGS doesn't accept more than one flag.
r2127: Fix issue #122: scons PREFIX doesn't create folder if it doesn't exist
r2128: Require SCons version 2.3.0 or higher now for the soname support.

author: lgo
msg: r2057: Do not lose network errors that happened during authentication.
r2115: Try every authn scheme only once. (fixes fallback from Negotiate to NTLM)
r2118: Do not use serf_bucket_headers_get() to get xxx-Authenticate header in
r2122: Fix issue #120: Error with ssl tunnel over proxy with KeepAlive off and
(requires r2096: serf_request_t: rename WRITTEN to WRITING_STARTED
r2090: write_to_connection: no need to set up the REQUEST localvar
